messages.speaker: Mina
messages.text: Can we just stop talking about this already?

messages.speaker: Liam
messages.text: What happened? You left the dorm without saying anything.

messages.speaker: Sophia
messages.text: You disappeared after the meeting. Are you still outside?

messages.speaker: Ethan
messages.text: You always overreact when you’re stressed. Just come back inside.

messages.speaker: Mina
messages.text: Seriously, you’re freaking everyone out.

choices.text: I think someone is following me near the back gate.
choices.comment: Strong clue about location and timeline.

choices.text: Relax, I just needed some fresh air.
choices.comment: Downplays the danger, gives fewer clues.

choices.text: Stop asking. I don’t owe anyone an explanation.
choices.comment: Makes the victim sound aggressive, but not informative.

messages.speaker: Sophia
messages.text: If you’re joking, it’s not funny anymore.

messages.speaker: Liam
messages.text: Do you want me to come get you at the gate?

messages.speaker: Mina
messages.text: You always make drama and then disappear.

messages.speaker: Ethan
messages.text: Just send your live location if it’s that serious.

choices.text: I’m near the old camera by the back gate. If something happens, you’ll see it on CCTV.
choices.comment: Links to CCTV and timeline reconstruction.

choices.text: Forget it. I’ll deal with it alone.
You’re all useless. I should never have texted here.
choices.comment: Adds tension but no concrete lead.

messages.speaker: System
messages.text: No new messages. The chat falls silent after your last text.

3.note: End of group-chat intro phase for university case.

messages.speaker: Olivia
messages.text: We are not redoing the slides again. It’s already 1 AM.

messages.speaker: John
messages.text: Client wants the numbers updated before tomorrow’s pitch.

messages.speaker: Ethan
messages.text: The victim is still on the 14th floor, right?

messages.speaker: Olivia
messages.text: Probably. They said they’d stay until the forecast model looks “perfect.”

choices.text: I’m still in the meeting room on the 14th floor. The security camera is watching me work overtime.
choices.comment: Connects office location, camera, and overtime condition.

choices.text: I went home already. You can deal with the rest.
Don’t ask where I am. Just send the files.
choices.comment: Hides position, less helpful for evidence.

messages.speaker: John
messages.text: The overtime pay won’t even cover this effort.

messages.speaker: Olivia
messages.text: You’re the one they’d promote if this project lands, you know.

messages.speaker: Ethan
messages.text: Stop arguing. Did the victim sign the updated contract already?

messages.speaker: Olivia
messages.text: If they walk away, we lose the client. Simple.

choices.text: The new partnership contract is still here with me. If anything happens, check who benefits from the signatures.
choices.comment: Strong link to financial motive and business agreement.

choices.text: I sent all the documents already. Nothing’s left on my desk.
choices.comment: Removes physical link from the office.

choices.text: Doesn’t matter. No one cares about this project anyway.
choices.comment: Adds emotional tone but no concrete clue.

messages.speaker: System
messages.text: No new messages. The office group stays silent.

3.note: End of group-chat intro phase for office case.

messages.speaker: Noah
messages.text: Who left the gate open again? The dog almost ran into the street.

messages.speaker: Isabella
messages.text: We’ve talked about this. Some people never listen.

messages.speaker: Mina
messages.text: The victim said they saw someone standing outside their window earlier.

messages.speaker: Olivia
messages.text: It’s probably just kids from the next street.

choices.text: If something happens to me tonight, remember: someone from this group has been watching my house.
choices.comment: Sets up personal motive and threat from inside the group.

choices.text: Everyone is overreacting. It was probably just the wind.
Please stop arguing. I’m turning off notifications.
choices.comment: Shuts down the conversation, no extra clues.

messages.speaker: Noah
messages.text: Are you okay? The sirens went past my house.

messages.speaker: Isabella
messages.text: I heard shouting near your place.

messages.speaker: Mina
messages.text: You were scared of someone in this group, right? You said that before.

choices.text: Check the camera on the street corner. If I don’t answer, look at who passed my house.
choices.comment: Gives a direct link to CCTV and location-based evidence.

choices.text: Stop messaging. I’m done with this group.

messages.speaker: System
messages.text: No response from the victim’s phone after the last message.

3.note: End of group-chat intro phase for neighborhood case.
